## Instalation :
```bash
> npm imon-videos-downloader
```

## Example (fb & insta)
```js
const { ndown } = require("imon-videos-downloader")
let URL = await ndown("https://www.facebook.com/100000959749712/posts/pfbid0288xi44nvodK9d7r3wf4LHeM3dtEsVghQXmz5t59axwz7KdLStYyg4qfvTVrAL27Ll/?app=fbl")
console.log(URL)
```

## Example (TikTok)
```js
const { tikdown } = require("imon-videos-downloader")
let URL = await tikdown("https://vt.tiktok.com/ZS2tVBhek/")
console.log(URL)
```

## Instagram Usage 
```js
const {instagram} = require("imon-videos-downloader");

const link = "https://www.instagram.com/p/DAxzjkAyWOm/?igsh=MTZ5eThrMXpteTFpOA==" //past video link

  instagram(link).then(data => {

    console.log(data)

});
```

## Output Example (instagram)
```
{
  "developer": "IMON",
  "devfb": "https://www.facebook.com/Imon.132233",
  "devwp": "https://Wa.me/+8801318582357",
  "status": true,
  "data": {
    "thumb": [
      "video thumbnail"
    ],
    "video": [
      "video video link"
    ],
    "images": []
  }
}
```

## Example (YouTube)
```js
const { ytdown } = require("imon-videos-downloader")
let URL = await ytdown("https://youtu.be/aRSuyrZFu_Q?si=bsfzgeeGmRpsHqnF")
console.log(URL)
```

## Output Example (YouTube)
```

  "developer": "IMON",
  "devfb": "https://www.facebook.com/Imon.132233",
  "devwp": "https://Wa.me/+8801318582357",
  "status": true,
  "data": {
    "title": "video title",
    "thumb": "video thumbnail",
    "video": "normal video link",
    "video_hd": "hd video link",
    "audio": "audio link",
    "quality": "360p/720p",
    "channel": "Not available",
    "desc": "Not available"
  }
}
```
## Example (Twitter)
```js
const { twitterdown } = require("imon-videos-downloader")
let URL = await twitterdown("https://twitter.com/TeamAbhiSha/status/1743351410761019794?t=vms8wxcU0mQuhVxwGCHjFw&s=19")
console.log(URL)
```

## Output Example (Twitter)
```
{
    "developer": "IMON",
    "devfb": "https://www.facebook.com/Imon.132233",
    "devwp": "https://Wa.me/+8801318582357",
    "status": true,
    "data": {
        "HD": "https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1743351351898181632/pu/vid/avc1/810x720/gKWI2KEyLdRMQBFa.mp4?tag=12",
        "SD": "https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1743351351898181632/pu/vid/avc1/404x360/dtDrE8AqyxXhoRhO.mp4?tag=12"

}
```

## Usage GDLink 
```js
const {GDLink} = require("imon-videos-downloader");

const url = 'url' // Public Google Drive Url

GDLink(url).then(data => {
  console.log(data)

});
```

## Usage Pintarest 
```js
const {pintarest} = require("imon-videos-downloader");

const url = 'url' // pintarest post url

  pintarest(url).then(data => {
  console.log(data)
    });
```

## Output Example (pintarest)
```

  "developer": "IMON",
  "devfb": "https://www.facebook.com/Imon.132233",
  "devwp": "https://Wa.me/+8801318582357",
  "status": 200,
  "data": {
    "title": "video title",
    "url": "video link",
    "thumbnail": "video thumbnail"
  }
}
```
## Usage CapCut 
```js
const { capcut } = require("imon-videos-downloader");

const url = "link" // capcut link

capcut(url).then(data => {
  console.log(data)
});
```

## Usage Likee 
```js
const { likee} = require("imon-videos-downloader");

 const url = "link" // past url
likee(url).then(data => { 
  console.log(data) 
});
```

## Output Example (Likee)
```
{
  "developer": "IMON",
  "devfb": "https://www.facebook.com/Imon.132233",
  "devwp": "https://Wa.me/+8801318582357",
  "status": 200,
  "data": {
    "title": "video title",
    "thumbnail": "video thumbnail",
    "withWatermark": "video link withWatermark",
    "withoutwatermark": "video link withoutwatermark"
  }
}
```

## Usage Threads
```js
const { threads } = require("imon-videos-downloader");

 const url = "link" // past url
threads(url).then(data => { 
  console.log(data) 
});
```


## Usage All Media Down
```bash
support url: facebook, tiktok, twitter, instagram, youtube, pinterest, gdrive, capcut, likee, threads
note: Let me know if any of the platforms you use are missing
```
```js
const {alldown} = require("imon-videos-downloader");
const url = 'url' // past url

  alldown(url).then(data => {
  console.log(data)
    });
```
## Output Example (alldown)
```
{
    "developer": "IMON",
    "devfb": "https://www.facebook.com/Imon.132233?mibextid=ZbWKwL",
    "devwp": "wa.me/+8801318582357",
    "status": true,
    "media": {
        "title": "video title",
        "low": "normal video link",
        "high": "hd video link"
    }
}
```
